dct_description_sm: California with one large indented bay. The island narrows to a small land bridge at about 30 degrees North. The area to the north of the island has been left completely blank.
Above the double hemisphere is the earth without water from a polar projection. Four women, possibly representing the four continents, are shown across the bottom of the page.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
